dt-example.title: Grouping data
dt-example.info:
DataTables has a [RowGroup extension](https://datatables.net/extensions/rowgroup/) which can be used to group identical data together. This can be really useful to help categorise data which naturally groups together (the _Office_ column in the table below is a good example).
ColumnControl has a set of buttons which can be used to control the grouping of data via RowGroup, the primary one of which is the `-content rowGroup` content type, shown in this example. When clicked on the table will be grouped and ordered (configurable) by the data in the target column.
